tool_description: Generates and sends expiration alerts based on configured rules, checking current inventory status against alert thresholds.

alert_config_id.description: Alert configuration to use for generating alerts

check_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the alert check is performed

force_send.description: Whether to send alerts regardless of frequency settings

error_messages: Invalid alert configuration ID: Alert configuration ID must be a valid existing configuration.
Invalid check timestamp: Check timestamp must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time format.
Alert configuration inactive: The specified alert configuration is not currently active.
usage: Provide alert_config_id and check_timestamp to generate alerts based on current inventory status. Set force_send to true to override frequency limitations.

alerts_generated.description: Number of alerts generated in this check

products_alerted.description: List of product IDs that triggered alerts

next_check_time.description: Recommended timestamp for the next alert check
